title: Cact-High
description: Cact-high is a board game I worked on for the last 5 years.
It's a card game that oposes 2 to 8 players in a cactus war where they have to destroy the other's cactus.
The game is hand built with local resources and 3d printing.

title: ClipOS
description: ClipOS is a self hosted website I made to make it easier for my friends and I to share our video game clips.
The website is built with Node.js and is hosted on my old PC.
ClipOS is only accessible via a local network or a ZeroTier VPN.

title: My portfolio
description: I've created this portfolio to help me find a job by sharing my projects and expericences.
It's a simple website built on HTML, CSS and JavaScript and hosted on GitHub.

title: Auto Fill PDF
description: Auto Fill PDF is a Python Script I made for Frederick Tremblay, a investment advisor.
The script is used to fill out a PDF form with the information of a client.
It was my first time using Python and I had to learn about the language and how to use it.
